sentences.en: All dogs are capable of doing harm to human beings.
sentences.cn: 只要是狗就可能会咬人。

sentences.en: He pleaded guilty to causing actual bodily harm.
sentences.cn: 他承认确实犯有人身伤害罪。

sentences.en: He would never frighten anyone or cause them any harm .
sentences.cn: 他永远不会吓唬或伤害任何人。

sentences.en: I'm sure he didn't mean any harm.
Low-priced imports will harm the industry.
sentences.cn: 低价进口品将会对该行业造成危害。

sentences.en: Our children deserve protection from harm.
sentences.cn: 我们的儿童理应得到保护免受伤害。

sentences.en: The boys didn't mean any harm—they just did it for a lark.
sentences.cn: 那些男孩并无恶意—他们只是闹着玩罢了。

sentences.en: The hijackers seemed anxious not to harm anyone.
sentences.cn: 劫持犯似乎焦虑不安，不想伤害任何人。

sentences.en: The move would cause irreparable harm to the organization.
sentences.cn: 这一举措会对该组织造成不可弥补的损害。

sentences.en: The rain was not sufficient to do any harm.
The scandal did his career a lot of harm.
sentences.cn: 丑闻对他的职业生涯造成很大损害。

sentences.en: There, now, you're all right. No harm done.
sentences.cn: 好了，你现在没事了，没人受伤。

sentences.en: These men were never told how they'dbeen put in harm's way.
sentences.cn: 从来没人告诉这些人他们是如何被置于险境的。

sentences.en: They were both found guilty of causing grievous bodily harm.
sentences.cn: 他们两人都被判造成他人严重人身伤害的罪名成立。

sentences.en: To cut taxes would probably do the economy more harm than good.
sentences.cn: 减税对经济而言可能弊大于利。

sentences.en: Workers scrambled to carry priceless objects out of harm's way.
sentences.cn: 工人们争先恐后地将价值连城的物品运到安全的地方。
